statements: UPDATE snippets_data SET title = 'Updated Title', description = 'New Description' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE snippets_data SET type = 'New Type', url = 'http://example.com/snippet' WHERE id = '1a2b3c4d-5e6f-7g8h-9i0j-1k2l3m4n5o6p';
UPDATE snippets_data SET title = 'New Title', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
UPDATE snippets_data SET type = 'Code', url = 'http://example.com/snippet' WHERE title = 'Sample Snippet';
UPDATE rich_snippets_table SET rating = 4.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE search_visibility_table SET visible = 'true' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE rich_snippets_table SET rating = 4.5, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = 12345
UPDATE search_visibility_table SET visible = false, timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE keyword = 'SEO'
UPDATE rich_snippets SET description='Updated product description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE search_results SET title='New Search Result Title', snippet='Updated search result snippet' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE rich_snippets SET name = 'Product A', description = 'New description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE search_results SET title = 'Updated Title', snippet = 'New snippet content' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE rich_snippets SET rating = 4.5, review_count = 120 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE improving_search_results SET seo_score = 'Excellent', meta_description = 'Optimize your website for search engines' WHERE page_id = 'home';
UPDATE rich_snippets SET rating = 4.5, review_count = 200 WHERE product_id = 12345;
UPDATE improving_search_results SET seo_score = 'high', mobile_friendly = true WHERE page_url = '/blog/post/123';
UPDATE rich_snippets_data SET title = 'New Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE search_visibility_data SET visibility = 'visible' WHERE page_url = '/example-page';
UPDATE rich_snippets_data SET rating = 4.5, review_count = 200 WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE snippet_images SET image_url = 'example.com/image.png' WHERE snippet_id = 54321;
